name: Troubleshooter (itch)
description:
Fall semester 2020, a computer science student races to deliver their final project and unwittingly damages their usb along the way. Play as Bin, a computer executable on a mission to deliver the data in this 3D platformer. Run, Jump, and build your way to complete each level. As you build more and more objects, the world begins to turn out of control. 

W = forward

A = left

D = right

S = back

Space = jump

Q = Build code Block
